question_text:
Question 16 
 
Which one of the following options represents the major components of oleum?  
 
(A) 
Sulfuric acid and nitric acid  
 
(B) 
Concentrated sulfuric acid and petroleum jelly 
 
 
 
(C)
  Sulfuric acid and hydrochloric acid  
 
(D) 
Sulfuric acid and sulfur trioxide  
 
 
 
[Chemical Technology, 1 Marks] 
Ans. 
(D) 
Sol. 
Major components of Oleum is sulfuric acid and sulfur Trioxide.
